plot: Geoff Lawton takes you into the world of Permaculture Soils. Understanding how microbes work in organic soils is the key to sustainable abundance and Lawton shows you how to do it.
title: Permaculture Soils
plot_es: Geoff Lawton takes you into the world of Permaculture Soils. Understanding how microbes work in organic soils is the key to sustainable abundance and Lawton shows you how to do it.
plot_en: Geoff Lawton takes you into the world of Permaculture Soils. Understanding how microbes work in organic soils is the key to sustainable abundance and Lawton shows you how to do it.
